channel.title: Self-Hosted
channel.description: Discover new software and hardware to get the best out of your network, control smart devices, and secure your data on cloud services. Self-Hosted is a chat show between Chris and Alex two long-time "self-hosters" who share their lessons and take you along for the journey as they learn new ones. A Jupiter Broadcasting podcast showcasing free and open source technologies you can host yourself.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A chat show between Chris and Alex two long-time "self-hosters" who share their lessons and take you on the journey of their new ones.
channel.itunes:author: Jupiter Broadcasting
channel.itunes:summary: Discover new software and hardware to get the best out of your network, control smart devices, and secure your data on cloud services. Self-Hosted is a chat show between Chris and Alex two long-time "self-hosters" who share their lessons and take you along for the journey as they learn new ones. A Jupiter Broadcasting podcast showcasing free and open source technologies you can host yourself.
channel.itunes:keywords: Self-Hosting, DIY, Linux, open source, encryption, privacy, on premise, hybrid cloud, Reverse Proxy, Dynamic DNS, HomeAssistant, hass.io, Raspberry Pi, Let’s Encrypt, Free Software, Jupiter Broadcasting, NextCloud, ngnix, Wyze, Alexa, HomeKit, remote control, ssh

item.title: Self-Hosted Coming Soon
item.author: Jupiter Broadcasting
item.itunes:author: Jupiter Broadcasting
item.itunes:subtitle: A new show that is your gateway to self hosting all the things, owning your data and talking about local and cloud hosting that you control.
item.description: A new show that is your gateway to self hosting all the things. Discover new software, regain control of cloud services and own your data. Learn how you can take steps to free yourself from the agenda of large corporations and business models designed to sell your information. Join Alex and Chris on their Self Hosting journey on this new podcast from Jupiter Broadcasting.
item.itunes:keywords: Self Hosted Podcast, Jupiter Broadcasting, NextCloud, Plex, netdata, Home Assistant, Alexa, Homekit, Google Assistant, Security Cameras, Encryption, Data privacy, open source, Linux
item.content:encoded:
A new show that is your gateway to self hosting all the things.

Discover new software, regain control of cloud services and own your data. Learn how you can take steps to free yourself from the agenda of large corporations and business models designed to sell your information.

Join Alex and Chris on their Self Hosting journey on this new podcast from Jupiter Broadcasting.

Support Self-Hosted
